Indian T20 League 2023

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#171e28″ divider_weight=”4px” admin_label=”Divider” _builder_version=”4.14.5″ max_width=”70px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.5″ text_font=”Roboto||||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.7)” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”22px” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

The biggest fantasy cricket carnival in the country is all ready to unleash itself on the cricket hungry population of India this summer when Chennai meets Gujarat at the Narendra Modi Stadium on 31st March. The first fixture of the Indian T20 League 2023 will pit the Hardik Pandya led defending champions against the second most successful Indian T20 League franchise captained by the talismanic MS Dhoni. This edition of Indian T20 League will have a total of 70 league matches with the final league match to be played on 21st May between Gujarat and Bangalore.

Winners of the previous editions of the T20 League

The Indian T20 league first took place in 2008 and saw Rajasthan stun everyone under the leadership of Shane Warne to get the title. That, however, also proved to be the last time Rajasthan won the IPL and their wait for another IPL title continues till date.

In the next edition, held in South Africa due to it clashing with the general elections, Hyderabad based team Deccan scripted a remarkable turnaround to win the tournament after finishing last in the previous season. The 2010 season was the first time that Chennai could lay their hands on the trophy and they would repeat the feat again in 2011, 2018 and 2021, all under the same man – Mahendra Singh Dhoni.

A revamped Kolkata under Gautam Gambhir would emerge as the first challenger to Chennai’s dominance and win the coveted trophy twice in three years, defeating Chennai in 2012 and Punjab in 2014. But in between those two years, Mumbai under a young Rohit Sharma, clinched the trophy for the first time in six attempts. The franchise would go on to repeat that feat four more times in the next seven editions. They won again in 2015, 2017, 2019 and in 2020. Their 5 wins in IPL finals made them the most successful side in the tournament’s history. 2016 also saw a different Hyderabad based team lift the trophy to give Bangalore yet another defeat in the finals of the tournament. A new winner of the tournament came to the fore in 2022 when Gujarat, a team that was playing its first season of the tournament, enjoyed a dream run and defeated Rajasthan in the final to lift the trophy.

In this way, out of the existing 10 teams, only four have never won the Indian T20 League trophy. That small list includes newcomers Lucknow and three old-timers in Bangalore, Punjab and Delhi.

Here are some reasons as to why you should choose My11Circle as your go-to app for fantasy cricket this season of Indian T20 League

Fastest Dedicated App: Not only is My11Circle easy and quick to download, it also doesn’t ruin your fantasy gaming experience with unnecessary interruptions like pop ups and advertisements. Its smooth interface means you can switch between contests effortlessly. The app is free to use for all and is compatible with various devices such as desktop and mobiles.

Millions of Enthusiastic Players: This app is one of the fastest growing fantasy gaming apps in the country with 13 million fantasy cricket league players. The more number of people you play with, the better your skills get. The numbers also tell how many users find it safe, easy to use and fun to play.

Trustworthy & Secured: When you register with My11Circle to enjoy fantasy gaming during the Indian T20 League, you wouldn’t need to be worried about your valuable personal information. The app protects all the information with appropriate end-to-end encryption. To protect it from hackers, your information is safely protected with appropriate end-to-end encryption. Your financial details are strictly used for withdrawal purpose and protected from unauthorized access to systems where we store personal data. Besides this, our team monitors and discloses fraudulent 24×7.

Tournaments for All: There are various Fantasy Cricket Leagues and each one has multiple contests you can join. Also, you can form multiple teams and enter different cash contests too. Whether you are new to playing Fantasy Cricket League or familiar with the platform, or you are an experienced player, there is a tournament just for you. We understand the different player’s needs.

An interesting feature of My11Circle is that you can create a private contest and invite your friends to join. This allows you to make Fantasy Cricket League a fun and personal experience. Also, My11circle has a dedicated page on tips and tricks for you.

Play with Sourav Ganguly: One of the biggest legends in cricket, Sourav Ganguly is the brand ambassador of My11Circle. We offer matches where you can participate and play with the former Indian captain. What’s more is that you can even win an opportunity to meet him. So, play more to win big.

How to play the T20 Fantasy League on My11Circle

Play T20 Fantasy Cricket League by going to My11Circle on your device. It is compatible with various devices including desktop, laptop, mobile, and tablet. Once you register, you can join the Fantasy Cricket League mania that the country is following.

Choose a match

The My11Circle app will feature all the matches of the Indian league. Whatever match you want to be involved in, you can choose to play.

Create your team

To start off, choose ‘Create Your Team’ on your screen. You will be given 100 credit points after you have chosen your team. Now your job is to pick the best possible players within that budget from the squads of both the teams that are playing. Your team should consist of 1 wicket-keeper, 3-5 batters, 1-3 all-rounders and 3-5 bowlers. You can have a maximum of 7 from one of the two teams involved. You would also need to assign a captain and vice-captain to your team. You would need to use your knowledge of the game as well as understanding of the conditions to put together this team. Make sure you know how the Fantasy Cricket point system works.

Choose a contest – Small, Mega and Practice

On My11Circle, there are different types of contests – Small, Mega, Practice, and other seasonal contests.
Small Contest: Compete with other teams for a small sum of money.
Mega Contest: Play against thousands of other fantasy cricket enthusiasts like yourself for bigger sums of money.
Practice Contest: To get better at your fantasy cricket skills, you can choose practice contests so you can learn faster without risking your money.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ excerpt.rendered: Indian T20 League 2023The biggest fantasy cricket carnival in the country is all ready to unleash itself on the cricket hungry population of India this summer when Chennai meets Gujarat at the Narendra Modi Stadium on 31st March.
